title: Did San Francisco vote to delete the name " Washington, " Lincoln " from school names?
subtitle: This effort was initiated by officials who were aimed at "dismantling the symbols of racism and the culture of white superiority."
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In January 2021, the San Francisco Board of Education issued a resolution aimed at removing the names of George Washington, Abraham Lincoln, and other prominent public figures from schools in the San Francisco Single School area.
